settings.paratext: Hair fall cannot be solved by just                       changing your shampoo, you need a treatment plan depending upon the type of your hair problem.                       This is why Traya only gives doctor prescribed treatment plans.
If you think that internal health has no correlation with hair loss, Traya cannot help you. Traya works because it will work on your health first, hair second.
Seeing more than 1,00,000 customers achieve desirable results with their hair growth has been a wonderful journey. Traya's combined approach of 3 sciences made it happen!
“Working with doctors who are motivated                       towards providing holistic solutions for Indian hair is the best part of being associated with                       Traya.”
“As a Dermat I know how difficult it is to                       help patients stay consistent with the plan. Traya has nailed it with its hair coach system.”

settings.question: How long does it take to see results?
settings.answer: It takes 5-6 months on an average to see visible results when on a complete recommended plan.

settings.question: Are there any side effects?
settings.answer: No side effects. All ingredients are natural and completely safe for use.

settings.question: Does this treatment work for all?
settings.answer: Traya treatment is customized by doctors based on the age, stage, and type of hair fall taking into consideration any underlying health conditions. It has effectively helped 1,50,000 customers see hair regrowth.
